state_test\/value.display_name: Value that should be overwrite test recipe value

name: state_test

recipes.state_test::check_value: Run this as a operational script.
recipes.state_test::default: Run this as a boot script.

long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Test that node attributes set by recipes persist between coverging.

An attribute is set to the default value "attrib"
Then the boot recipe ("default") sets it to "recipe"
Then a third operatinal script runs to verify that the attribute is set to "recipe"
the op script should fail otherwise

= REQUIREMENTS:

= ATTRIBUTES: 

= USAGE:
